sourceMeaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>towel</radical> and make it <radical>long</radical>. It has to be longer than that! For this will be your <kanji>notebook</kanji>, which you will write all your notes in.
meaningInfo: You are making the towel really long, because it's white and it might be good for writing in. It's going to become your notebook.
readingMnemonic: Inside your long towel <kanji>notebook</kanji> you just write the same name over and over again: "Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading>" (<ja>ちょう</ja>).
readingInfo: Something bad is going to happen, and you need to warn everybody. It's her, it's her, it's her. Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou, Mrs. Chou!
